about_the_game:
Overview

RLChess is a fun twist on traditional chess that mixes strategy with elements of party games, creating an exciting experience for both single and multiplayer modes. Step into a world where your armies come alive and compete against others in smart, fast-paced games.

Gameplay

In RLChess, players are kings who can build their own armies. The game uses a "wego" format, meaning all players make their moves at the same time within a given period, so there's no waiting around for your turn. This keeps the game moving quickly and makes it more enjoyable.

Key Features

  • 2-4 Players Supported: Play against one friend or several.

  • Wego Format: Everyone plans and executes their moves simultaneously, which speeds up the game and adds excitement.

  • Customizable Armies: Choose and organize your troops with different units and strategies to beat your opponents. Every decision affects your chances of winning.

  • Direct Confrontation: Win the game by capturing all enemy pieces or by directly capturing other players' kings.

  • Elegant Marble Art Style: The game features a sleek marble look that makes the classic game of chess feel fresh and visually appealing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Dual core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 or equivalent DX11 GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not supported

short_description: Dive into the ultimate chess showdown with RLChess! It's not just a board game; it's an epic battlefield where classic chess meets wild party antics. Get ready for a chess revolution that's packed with thrilling twists and lively interaction. Charge into RLChess and turn the chess world on its head!
